issue.title: msguides.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.22

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://msguides.com/office-2019

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. There are empty spaces at top and bottom and an ad on left right

2. Screenshots
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46019727/188542689-aa9ffe7d-b82b-4942-a280-576776da6e76.png)


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://xhamster18.desi/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fxhamster18.desi%2F) ### Comment Username: `@rajatmathurs` > Pop up new blank window with url is still opening > http://tsyndicate.com/api/v1/direct/917067d8d1944bb69e97c0ddbe6bc6256316c7f8cea5fecdcbcc43a213c8fcb4a0e94cf5?spot=917067d8d1944bb69e97c0ddbe6bc6256316c7f8cea5fecdcbcc43a213c8fcb4a0e94cf5&subid_1=xhamster18.desi&subid_3=rec_index_a&abt=middle_group_c&xvr=0&xoc=straight&xtype=cams&xma=1&categories= > > Steps to produce > > 1. Be on India IP > > 2. Open https://xhamster18.desi/ > > 3. Clicking on any video opens the new pop up blank window. > > First you don't believe the timer issue, now the timer issue is solved, for that thank you, but you forget to fix the pop window which is still opening for me. > > Without confirming with me you closed the issue, this is not done. I am reopening, this issue. If you still can't see the ad at your end then connect with my phone with any app that will share my mobile screen with you, then only will you see the problem that i am facing.
